name: Dungeon (Bepary Games)
description:
Bepary Games

Dungeon

Game information/description

Run around the incredible dungeon where you will get lost for ever, and if do finish the first level there are 4 more levels. You are lost for ever in this game!

Controls

  • Up arrow to move forward.
  • Down Arrow to move backwards.
  • Left arrow to turn left.
  • Right arrow to turn right.
  • P to pause the game.
  • E to exit.
  • R to restart.
  • M to go to the main menu.

System requirements:

Windows:

  • Windows Xp or above
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics
  • 1GHz CPU

Mac OS X:

  • Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Ubuntu:

  • Ubuntu 14 or above
  • OpenGL-capable graphics card with valid driver
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Note: this game runs only on Windows but you can use Wine to use this game on other platforms.

This game is not copyright free and should not be distributed without permision from Bepary Games. This game does NOT use resources from other publishers.

The game has been programmed by Maruf Bepary and designed by Mickael Bonet.
